programme.desc: When Reba enters a beauty pageant for grandmothers, Barbra Jean becomes jealous and sets out to prove she is the true Grandma Hart.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is thrilled when the city's hottest real estate agent wants to interview her for a job, until the woman shows up unannounced for a surprise meeting.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Kyra passes her driving test, Barbra Jean makes her sign a safety contract and provides her with a cell phone that contains a hidden GPS chip.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock volunteers to be a football coach and encourages Jake to try out for the team, so Reba persuades Van to train him for the tryouts.

programme.title: South Beach Love

programme.title: Royal Hearts
programme.desc: Montana rancher Hank learns that he's the last heir of the late King of Merania and has inherited the throne. His daughter Kelly convinces the reluctant royal to step in as king so the country can keep its independence.

programme.desc: Sparks fly between a princess and her bodyguard after her budding romance with an artist fizzles out.

programme.title: The Royal We
programme.desc: When her older sister elopes with a non-royal, Princess Bea, who has lived her life away from her royal duties, must step in and honor the arranged marriage to a small kingdom prince.

programme.desc: An aspiring jewelry designer returns to Belgium to visit her grandfather and hopefully win the Valentine's Day Diamond Contest.

programme.desc: Refusing to leave a newly listed home, a ghost becomes convinced she cannot pass over until she gets a woman back together with her ex.

programme.desc: Against her better judgment, Reba gives in to Cheyenne's pleas and hires the unemployed Van as her assistant, only to be surprised when he sells the house she has been trying to unload for weeks.

programme.desc: Reba takes it upon herself to keep Van sober when she suspects he has a drinking problem; Kyra and her band are invited to perform at a USO event for soldiers leaving for Iraq.

programme.desc: Cheyenne and Van must run interference at a client party after Reba takes a pill, by mistake, that will make her violently ill if she drinks alcohol.

programme.desc: When Barbra Jean signs Reba up for an online dating service, Reba winds up dating a mystery man and spending less time with the family.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The roommates buy a dying artist's painting, hoping to sell it for a profit.

programme.desc: Blanche has reservations about dating a blind man, since he cannot see her physical attributes; Dorothy and Rose coach a children's team.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose feels inadequate when her new boyfriend experiences impotency.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia disapproves of the man Dorothy is dating; Blanche and Rose befriend juvenile delinquents.

programme.title: His & Hers
programme.desc: Lawyers Mark and Dana are the perfect married couple until they find themselves on opposite sides of a highly public divorce case involving a warring reality show couple.

programme.title: A Brush With Love
programme.desc: A discouraged artist is convinced by her best friend to paint the perfect man, hoping it will attract love. When the portrait is finished, they discover that he's a real-life Prince Charming, and the artist embarks on a whirlwind romance with him.

programme.title: Autumn at Apple Hill
programme.desc: A woman inherits an inn from her grandparents.

programme.title: Romance With a Twist
programme.desc: Former dancer Luna pairs up with Bennett, a world-class aerialist, when he finds himself without a partner for his upcoming performance at the local arts festival.

programme.title: The Professional Bridesmaid
programme.desc: A professional bridesmaid uses her talents to help a mayor's daughter keep her wedding on track. However, things get complicated when an ambitious local reporter snoops around to get close to the mayor for a big scoop.

programme.title: Feeling Butterflies
programme.desc: Emily's booming butterfly business delivers monarchs to a birthday party, where she meets Garrett, a single father. With help from Garrett and his daughter, her business soon begins to take flight.
